text: 2021 T10 League or Abu Dhabi T10 2021 is the fourth season of the T10 League. The matches will have a 10-over-a-side format with a time duration of 90 minutes. The tournament will be played as a round robin followed by semifinals and the final. It was scheduled to be played from 19 to 28 November 2020 at the Sheikh Zayed Cricket Stadium. However, the tournament is rescheduled to held from 28 January to 6 February 2021 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Squads== {|class="wikitable" |- ! style="width:280px;"| Team Abu Dhabi ! style="width:280px;"| Maratha Arabians ! style="width:280px;"| Bangla Tigers ! style="width:280px;"| Deccan Gladiators |- |valign=top| |valign=top| |valign=top| |valign=top| |- ! style="width:280px;"| Qalandars ! style="width:280px;"| Delhi Bulls ! style="width:280px;"| Northern Warriors ! style="width:280px;"| Karnataka Tuskers |- |valign=top| |valign=top| |valign=top| |valign=top| |} ==References== T10 League
title: 2021 T10 League
